attributes.action: Ensure airlines have a simple refund process for cancelled flights due COVID19.
attributes.additional_details: Airlines, such as Easyjet, are making it more difficult for customers to claim refunds for cancelled flights, in response to restrictions on travel as a result of COVID 19.  Airlines are not being pro-active in responding to customer feedback in relation to the process of applying for a refund and are not making the process simple and easily accessible for passengers.
attributes.background: Ensure that all airlines have a simple, easily accessible way for passengers to claim refunds for cancelled flights due to government restrictions on travel, in response to COVID 19, and advertise this appropriately.

rejection.details:
Arrangements for refunding, changing or rebooking travel are a matter for individual airlines and travel agents, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel cancellations, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
